parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Resets the info a group has about a target, forcing [[knowsAbout]] value to 0.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group '''forgetTarget''' target

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] or [[Object]] - group itself or unit in a group

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]] - group target

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>soldier1 [[forgetTarget]] soldier2;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Give enemyBob some amnesia:<code>[[onEachFrame]] { enemyBob [[forgetTarget]] [[player]] };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[knowsAbout]], [[targetsQuery]], [[targetsAggregate]], [[nearTargets]], [[reveal]], [[getHideFrom]], [[targetKnowledge]]
</value></part></template>
